## ResourceManager.registerClass() method

Register a serializable class and its properties.

**Signature:**

```typescript
registerClass(cls: SerializableClass): void;
```

</th><th>

</td><td>

Serializable class metadata to register.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

void

## Remarks

- No effect if the class is already registered. - Also registers the class's properties with canonical paths.
